name: KLOPPYSSIMO
description:
KLOPPYSSIMO is an experimental and musical sandbox game.

Set in a silent ocean of sand and emptiness. Place musical elements, experiment around and create your own beats, rhythms and tunes. Play with the many possibillities and try out the countless combinations.

From a randomly generated map, to big and empty maps to prebuilt maps, there are maps for every playstyle!

This is an early prototype that I made for my Bachelor project at ZHdK in game design. I started around february 2022 and finished the first major milestone.

Have fun creating your own tunes and share the game with others:)
